title: Extended Classic: Cosmic Queries: General Astrophysics 101
description: Curious about general astrophysics? Join us for class this week as Prof. Neil Tyson and assistant Leighann Lord explain some of the basics. Now extended with 12 minutes of Neil, Bill Nye and Steven Soter swapping Carl Sagan stories in the “Cosmic Crib.”
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
